body.p: GCCTRL request controls the garbage collection operation (Pause or Resume). The following sequence of operations will take place for GCCTRL request.

li.p: If gcActiveCount is zero, garbage collection is not active. Send GCCTRL completion.
Process the state of every garbage collection state structure.
If state is not IDLE, copy current state to gcPausedState (variable in state structure) and change current state to GC_PAUSED.
Process the state of every garbage collection state structure.
If state is not IDLE, copy gcPausedState to current state and call garbageCollectionStateHandle function, which will continue from where garbage collection paused.
